item.description:
Join us for an AMC hike on the mid-state trail in Leominster.

Fuel up for a carpool from Dave's Diner on Route 28 in Middleborough at 7:30.  (Dave's is about 0.8 miles east of the big traffic circle uniting Routes 28, 18 and 44 in Middleborough. We will leave around 8:30 for the rest of the trip. It is a 90 minute drive.)

Activity:Hiking

Status:OPEN Five mile hike from Redemption Rock to Crowhill cliffs and back. (Links go to relevant pages at Midstate Trail web pages.) Meet at 10:30 am Redemption Rock Parking Lot.

Bring lunch/ water/ sturdy footwear.

From Rte. 2 exit 25 take Rte. 140 south 3.1 miles to Redemption Rock parking on right. Heavy rain cancels.

Date(s):May 30, 2013 (Thu)Location:Leominster, ma,  Massachusetts, Central,  MA

Difficulty:C4C (which means easy, slow, hike of 5 miles or less) Rope climbing is not required!  The picture just shows what the site is like.

Pre-registration is not required for this activity. AMC Membership is also not required.  However, you may wish to contact the AMC leader if you have any questions about the hike. The AMC does not allow dogs on its hikes.

Offered By: Southeastern Massachusetts AMC

Leader: Jerry Yos 
781-935-4647 (best time to call: before 11 pm) (Email this contact person.)

More info about the AMC here

Post your questions here if you have questions about the breakfast or carpool.
item.how_to_find_us: Street address is approximation of 3.1 miles south from Exit 25 off Route 2

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday Morning Hike Leominster State Forest
